body: China Digital Times has translated the latest instruction issued by various authorities to media outlets. The censor machine claims that it would shut down websites which are lax in monitoring news concerning Egypt.
original_body: China Digital Times has translated the latest instruction issued by various authorities to media outlets. The censor machine claims that it would shut down websites which are lax in monitoring news concerning Egypt.
title: China: January 2011 censorship instruction from Chinese authorities

sentence: China Digital Times has translated the latest instruction issued by various authorities to media outlets.
The censor machine claims that it would shut down websites which are lax in monitoring news concerning Egypt.
